answers.answer: Moving from being low not in like kicks and other movements**

I know exactly wat your talking about i am going to be 30 weeks on monday and she is always down and it does get painful mostly in my back.....but all the pain is worth it after they are born...hope everything goes great for u....
Oh yeah, I'm 27 wks 1 day. My daughter always kicks me so low I feel like her foot is going to come out. She hasn't moved up at all.

question: I'm 21w5d and at my ultrasound at 20w5d. They had to dig into my pelvic bones to find her head. She isn't moving from my lower abdomen. And the pressure I get is horrific. I feel like a body builder is inside of me pushing on my pelvic region and slowly tearing it apart. I have no pain just pressure. Horribly uncomfortable. The drs say there's nothing to worry about my cervix isn't opening and baby is right on track. I'm seeing a high risk Dr for  my diabetes so he double and triple checks things.Is anyone's else's baby's really low and just not moving?
title: pressure because shes so low!!!!
